text: Jack Ralite (14 May 1928 – 12 November 2017) was a French politician. He was elected in 1973 to the Seine-Saint-Denis constituency for the French Communist Party. In 1981 he became Minister for Health and Minister for Employment from 1981 to 1984. In 1984 he became Mayor of Aubervilliers, a post he retained until 2003. He was born in Châlons-en-Champagne, France. Ralite died in Aubervilliers, France of respiratory failure at the age of 89.L'ancien ministre communiste Jack Ralite est mort == References == Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French communists Category:French mayors Category:Government ministers of France Category:People from Marne Category:Politicians from Île-de-France
title: Jack Ralite
